pr_title: DHFPROD-5984: Filter on sourceName and sourceType as hub facets.

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5984: Filter on sourceName and sourceType as hub facets

timeline.bodyText: Can there be spaces in a "displayName"? We'd want this to be as user-friendly as possible, so "Source Name" would be better than "SourceName".
timeline.author: rjrudin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,6 +30,22 @@ const hubPropertiesConfig = [
     propertyPath: 'createdByStep',
     entityTypeId: ' '
   },
+  {
+    facetName: "sourceName",
+    displayName: "SourceName",

replies.bodyText: Yes there can be spaces, thanks for noticing that.
replies.author: timur-isangulov
